compatibility.notes: The GPL-2.0-with-font-exception license is a strong copyleft license. Any derivative work or software that incorporates GPL-2.0-with-font-exception licensed code must also be distributed under the same license. The font exception allows the use of fonts without imposing the copyleft requirements on the entire work.

key_requirements: Ensure that the GPL license text is included with any distribution.
Provide access to the source code when distributing binaries.
Maintain the same license for derivative works.
license.name: GPL-2.0-with-font-exception
obligations: If you distribute modified versions of the software, you must disclose the source code.
You must include a copy of the GPL license with any distribution.
You must include copyright notices for the original authors.
You must include a notice stating any changes made to the original software.
If you distribute the software or derivative works, they must be licensed under the same GPL license.
